name: Monster Vs Mercenaries
description:
A side-scrolling game about an aquatic creature swimming and jumping over obstacles and enemies.

You play as a creature that has recently escaped a prison holding you. To escape, you exit into a forest and jump from one body of water to the next until you finally outrun (or out-swim) the mercenaries hunting you down, or you can jump onto enemies and jump again to get over them!

This game was made for the GMTK Game Jam 2020. Enjoy, and good luck!
